queries.description: LEFT JOIN and FILTER
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.strCol2, {tbl2}.doubleCol1 IS NULL OR {tbl1}.intCol1 > 3 AS boolFlag FROM {tbl1} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1

queries.description: LEFT JOIN and TRANSFORM
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.strCol2, {tbl1}.intCol1 * {tbl2}.doubleCol1 + {tbl2}.intCol1 FROM {tbl1} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1

queries.description: LEFT JOIN and AGGREGATE
queries.sql: SELECT COUNT({tbl2}.intCol1), MIN({tbl2}.intCol1), MAX({tbl2}.doubleCol1), SUM({tbl2}.doubleCol1), AVG({tbl2}.doubleCol1), BOOL_AND({tbl2}.boolCol1), BOOL_OR({tbl2}.boolCol1) FROM {tbl1} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1

queries.description: LEFT JOIN and GROUP BY
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl2}.intCol1, COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 GROUP BY {tbl2}.intCol1

queries.description: LEFT JOIN and GROUP BY
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.strCol2, {tbl2}.intCol1, COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 GROUP BY {tbl1}.strCol2, {tbl2}.intCol1

queries.description: LEFT JOIN and GROUP BY with AGGREGATE
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.strCol2, COUNT({tbl2}.intCol1), MIN({tbl2}.intCol1), MAX({tbl2}.doubleCol1), SUM({tbl2}.doubleCol1), AVG({tbl2}.doubleCol1) FROM {tbl1} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 GROUP BY {tbl1}.strCol2

queries.description: LEFT JOIN and GROUP BY with AGGREGATE
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl2}.strCol2, COUNT({tbl2}.intCol1), MIN({tbl2}.intCol1), MAX({tbl2}.doubleCol1), SUM({tbl2}.doubleCol1), AVG({tbl2}.doubleCol1) FROM {tbl1} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 GROUP BY {tbl2}.strCol2

queries.description: LEFT JOIN and SORT (by default, H2 treats null as the smallest value, which is different from Postgres, thus we don't test the default ordering)
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl2}.doubleCol1 AS col FROM {tbl1} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 ORDER BY col NULLS FIRST

queries.description: LEFT JOIN and GROUP BY with AGGREGATE AND SORT
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.strCol2, COUNT({tbl2}.intCol1), MIN({tbl2}.intCol1) AS minCol, MAX({tbl2}.doubleCol1) AS maxCol, SUM({tbl2}.doubleCol1) FROM {tbl1} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 GROUP BY {tbl1}.strCol2 ORDER BY minCol DESC NULLS LAST, maxCol ASC NULLS LAST

queries.description: intCol1 IS NULL is always false
queries.comment: Even when tableConfig nullHandlingEnabled is false, V2 respects column nullability
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol1 IS NULL

queries.description: intCol1 IS NOT NULL is always true
queries.comment: Even when tableConfig nullHandlingEnabled is false, V2 respects column nullability
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol1 IS NOT NULL

queries.description: nIntCol1 IS NULL is always false
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE nIntCol1 IS NULL

queries.description: nIntCol1 IS NOT NULL is always true
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE nIntCol1 IS NOT NULL

queries.description: nnIntCol1 IS NULL is always false
queries.comment: Even when tableConfig nullHandlingEnabled is false, V2 respects column nullability
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE nnIntCol1 IS NULL

queries.description: nnIntCol1 IS NOT NULL is always true
queries.comment: Even when tableConfig nullHandlingEnabled is false, V2 respects column nullability
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE nnIntCol1 IS NOT NULL

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=true, intCol1 is considered -2147483648
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT intCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=false, intCol1 is considered -2147483648
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=false; SELECT intCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=true, nIntCol1 is considered null
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT nIntCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=false, nIntCol1 is considered -2147483648
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=false; SELECT nIntCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=true, nnIntCol1 is considered -2147483648
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT nnIntCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=false, nnIntCol1 is considered -2147483648
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=false; SELECT nnIntCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: join 3 tables, mixed join conditions with null non-matching
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 > {tbl2}.doubleCol1 JOIN {tbl3} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl3}.strCol2

queries.description: join 3 tables, mixed join condition with null matching
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 != {tbl2}.doubleCol1 JOIN {tbl3} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl3}.strCol2

queries.description: join 2 tables, mixed join conditions of null matching or non-matching
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 > {tbl2}.doubleCol1 AND {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1

queries.description: intCol1 IS NULL is always false
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol1 IS NULL

queries.description: intCol1 IS NOT NULL is always true
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol1 IS NOT NULL

queries.description: nIntCol1 IS NULL is honored
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE nIntCol1 IS NULL

queries.description: nIntCol1 IS NOT NULL is honored
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE nIntCol1 IS NOT NULL

queries.description: nnIntCol1 IS NULL is always false
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE nnIntCol1 IS NULL

queries.description: nnIntCol1 IS NOT NULL is always true
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE nnIntCol1 IS NOT NULL

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=true, intCol1 is considered -2147483648
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT intCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=false, intCol1 is considered -2147483648
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=false; SELECT intCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=true, nIntCol1 is considered null
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT nIntCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=false, nIntCol1 is considered -2147483648
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=false; SELECT nIntCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=true, nnIntCol1 is considered -2147483648
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT nnIntCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: When projected with enableNullHandling=false, nnIntCol1 is considered -2147483648
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=false; SELECT nnIntCol1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol1 = 'bob'

queries.description: aggregate with null checkers
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT SUM(intCol1) FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol1 IS NOT NULL GROUP BY strCol2

queries.description: null checks in aggregate are skipped on not nullable columns
queries.comment: Given intCol1 is not explicitly nullable, V2 removes the IS NOT NULL predicate
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT strCol2, COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol1 IS NOT NULL GROUP BY strCol2
queries.h2Sql: SELECT strCol2, COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} GROUP BY strCol2

queries.description: null checks in aggregate are honored on nullable columns
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT strCol2, COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE nIntCol1 IS NOT NULL GROUP BY strCol2

queries.description: aggregate with null checkers on key from group set are skipped on not nullable columns
queries.comment: Given strCol2 is not explicitly nullable, V2 returns empty set
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol2 IS NULL GROUP BY strCol2
queries.h2Sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE 1 = 0 GROUP BY strCol2

queries.description: aggregate with null checkers on key from group set are honored on not nullable columns
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE nStrCol2 IS NULL GROUP BY nStrCol2

queries.description: join 3 tables, mixed join conditions with null non-matching
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 > {tbl2}.doubleCol1 JOIN {tbl3} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl3}.strCol2

queries.description: join 3 tables, mixed join condition with null matching
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 != {tbl2}.doubleCol1 JOIN {tbl3} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl3}.strCol2

queries.description: join 2 tables, mixed join conditions of null matching or non-matching
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 > {tbl2}.doubleCol1 AND {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1

queries.description: aggregate with null checkers
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT SUM(intCol1) FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol1 IS NOT NULL GROUP BY strCol2

queries.description: aggregate with null checkers
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol1 IS NOT NULL GROUP BY strCol2

queries.description: aggregate with null checkers on key from group set
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol2 IS NULL GROUP BY strCol2

queries.description: select only with NULL handling
queries.sql: SET enableNullHandling=true; SELECT * FROM {tbl1} WHERE strCol2 IS NULL AND intCol1 IS NOT NULL
